context: I'm great. Thanks. I'm looking for suggestions for a movie night with friends, any chance you can help me out?
I think I can! Maybe a musical like Grease (1978) for everyone to sing along?
resp: Or even a classic/cheesy action film like The Rock (1996) ? Something quotable like Anchorman
